abstract: <jats:title>Abstract</jats:title><jats:p>We report the first record of the larvae of a species in the butterfly genus <jats:italic>Ochlodes</jats:italic> (Lepidoptera: Hesperiidae) feeding on rice and causing notable damage. Based on the results of DNA barcoding of the reared adults and further investigation of male and female genitalia, we revise the status of taxon <jats:italic>hyrcana</jats:italic> Christoph, 1893 as a subspecies of <jats:italic>Ochlodes sylvanus</jats:italic> (Esper, [1778]) stat. rev.</jats:p>
title: First record of skipper genus Ochlodes scudder, 1872 (Lepidoptera: Hesperiidae) feeding on rice, with a note on the taxonomy of Ochlodes sylvanus hyrcana (Christoph, 1893) stat. rev.
